DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and pharmacokinetics of montelukast (MK-0476) in the treatment of Japanese pediatric participants with perennial allergic rhinitis (PAR). The primary hypothesis of this study is that montelukast oral granules (OG) and chewable tablets (CT) provide appropriate exposure to montelukast in Japanese pediatric participants with PAR.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Safety and Pharmacokinetics of Montelukast (MK-0476) in the Treatment of Japanese Pediatric Participants With Perennial Allergic Rhinitis (MK-0476-520)
